name: photo-of-the-day-july-28-2008
title: Photo Of The Day: July 28, 2008
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: This one comes to us from the Nashville Flickr photo walk on Saturday night. We’re suckers for city shots, especially from some different perspectives. Thanks, Matt! Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry- We’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
contentEncoded:
This one comes to us from the Nashville Flickr photo walk on Saturday night. We’re suckers for city shots, especially from some different perspectives. Thanks, Matt!

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry- We’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
